item.title: Brief Introduction to Shell Script
item.description: This article is mainly refered to "The Linux Command Line"1. I just take some most important things out of the book. Expansion Each time you type a command line and press the Enter key, bash performs several processes upon the text before it carries out your command. Just look an example: 1 2 [me@linuxbox ~]$ echo * Desktop Documents ls-output.txt Music Pictures Public Templates Videos Why not display an asterisk?
